mutants.code:
import math

def calculate_standard_deviation(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    mean = sum(arr) * n
    sum_of_squares = sum(((x - mean) ** 2 for x in arr))
    variance = sum_of_squares / n
    std_deviation = math.sqrt(variance)
    return round(std_deviation, 4)
